doc:
Francis Girod https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Francis_Girod 0 Francis Girod (9 October 1944 – 19 November 2006) was a French film director, actor, and screenwriter. He directed 20 films between 1974 and 2006. His film L'enfance de l'art was entered into the 1988 Cannes Film Festival. In 1994 he was a member of the jury at the 44th Berlin International Film Festival. Francis_Girod ( 9_October_1944 – 19_November_2006 ) was a_French_film_director , actor , and screenwriter . He directed 20_films between 1974_and_2006 . His_film L'enfance de l'art was_entered into the_1988_Cannes_Film_Festival . In 1994 he was a_member of the_jury at the_44th_Berlin_International_Film_Festival .
